text: ==Portugal== * Angola – António de Lencastre, Governor of Angola (1772–1779) * Macau – *# D. Alexdra da Silva Pedrosa Guimares, Governor of Macau (1777–1778) *# Jose Vicente da Silveira Meneses, Governor of Macau (1778–1780) Colonial governors Colonial governors 1778
title: List of colonial governors in 1778
